name: FeedTheAnimals
description:
CONTROLS

A - D or Left and Right Arrows to Move 

SPACE to Fire Projectile

*Fullscreen is recommended. It is at the bottom right cornor, enable it after pressing Run Game.

IMPORTANT NOTES:

This prototype is from Unity Junior Programmer Lessons Unit - 2.

I do not own the assets and here is the link of the asset I used.

I wanted to share this prototype here because I implemented score and game over screen so it became a playable game now.

Enjoy.
